timeline.message: Add test cases for error recovery
Add generated internal and external nodes

Merge branch 'incremental-parser' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into incremental-parser

 Conflicts:
	compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerinalang/compiler/internal/parser/BallerinaParserErrorHandler.java
	compiler/ballerina-parser/src/main/java/io/ballerinalang/compiler/internal/parser/tree/STNodeFactory.java

	compiler/ballerina-treegen/src/main/resources/syntax_tree_descriptor.json

timeline.bodyText:
Will this have a problem if there is some additional token before key keyword:
for eg: table foo key() [{k1:v1}].
